column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////As mentioned
column2: the chocolate croissant was very good. The "Buffalo" Turkey sandwich was supposed to have blue cheese dressing but if it did
column3: then it was very light. The "buffalo" spice
column5: was very mild to nonexistent. If you like your bacon fatty and gristley
column6: then you might like this entree. I didn't. As for the latte...I'm heading back to Starbucks.
